featured.text: The first book to be printed likewise in English was about the history of Troy.

definition.zh_def: 特洛伊，古希臘神話中的一座城市，以其在特洛伊戰爭中的重要性而聞名。
definition.en_def: Troy, an ancient city in Greek mythology known for its significance in the Trojan War.
definition.example: The story of the Trojan War is centered around the city of Troy.
